body.name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Refreshing Gel-Cream for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, 1.7 Oz (50g), 1 Count (Packaging May Vary)

Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 49 mins
features: Lightweight Moisturizer For Face: This oil free moisturizer instantly locks in moisture; With Vitamin C and Fruit Water Antioxidant Complex, this face lotion is suitable for all skin types, but is ideal for dry skin types
Gel Texture Face Cream with Brightening Vitamin C: This face moisturizer delivers deep hydration, with a light texture that leaves skin feeling hydrated, soft, fresh and smooth

Garnier SkinActive Moisturizer: Whether you need intense hydration to quench thirsty, dry skin, brightening Vitamin C, anti aging moisturizer with hyaluronic acid, or a moisturizer with spf, there's a Garnier SkinActive moisturizer for you

Garnier Skin Care: We developed Garnier SkinActive with gentle formulas to leave your skin looking fresh and healthy, no matter your skin type; Find the face wash, moisturizer, bb cream, makeup remover, eye cream, serum, or mask for you

Commited to making Garnier a greener beauty brand: As a leading global beauty brand, we aspire to create a positive impact by paving the way towards more sustainable beauty. Approved by Cruelty Free International under the Leaping Bunny Program.
body.description: Let Moisture Rescue with Antioxidant Fruit Water and moisture-loving ingredients come to your skin's rescue! These oil-free lightweight formulas will help defend skin against external aggressors such as daily stress and pollution that can strip your skin of its vital hydration to lock in 24 hr moisture. • Instantly locks in 24hr moisture and soothes dry skin • Vitamin C and fruit water antioxidant complex • With continued use, moisture barrier is strengthened and skin looks healthier and feels softer • See a visible reduction in roughness caused by dryness Gently apply Garnier Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, For Dry Skin to face and neck, every morning and night after cleansing.

Micellar Cleansing Water Moisture Rescue Moisturizer, Dry Clearly Brighter Anti Puff Eye Roller Soothing Facial Mist with Rose Water Your Recommended Regimen Cleanse + remove makeup with Micellar Cleansing Water Moisturize With Moisture Rescue Treat Under Eye With Clearly Brighter Anti Puff Eye Roller Refresh With Soothing Facial Mist With Rose Water. Get 24 hour hydration leaving skin feeling soft, fresh, and smooth Reduces under-eye puffiness and brightens skin. Instantly hydrate and soothe skin after one use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lightweight moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: I got this not expecting much, but I was extremely pleased with this purchase. This moisturizer goes on very light and isn’t oily or sticky. It holds a long lasting moisture and performs very well. I have sensitive dry skin and the ingredients are very gentle on my skin and are non-irritating. It has a nice pleasant and clean scent, not overpowering, but just the right amount of scent. It doesn’t leave any build up on my face. This is perfect for daily use. It is a great product for a low price. This has become my go to daily moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ABSOLUTELY MUST HAVE!
reviews.reviewText: I have been struggling for a year with extremely dry itchy flaking skin! Gross. I know! Idk when or why it started. I had been living in Florida for a year at this point. I'm 38 and always had oiley skin but maybe the sun dried it out bc never have I had such terrible skin!I was using ponds for dry skin at night and day and bought a electric face scrubber, used wash that exfoliates and still flakes, flakes flakes.I read some reviews and said "eff it let me try. What's the worst that can happen"?Well. Night 1 after cleaned face and shower. I didn't see flakes. Nice. Cool. Go to bed only to wake up with... holy crap! No flakes!Day two. Wash face. Put on. Usually by the time I get to work I'm shedding skin flakes around nose, lip edges or eye brows.None. Mid day I checked .. no flakes .. what is life? This is the secret sauce of moist skin ladies and gents!By the time I got home .. no flakes. My heart is so light and feathery🤩I have been using for several days.No 👏more👏flakes👏I am so happy and HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS!My only regret is not finding this sooner.Your face doesn't feel oiley. A nice clean light scent. And best part is my face no longer itches and flakes. I would give 100 🌟 if I could.Thank you from the bottom of my heart Garnier ❤️**adding that I forgot to put on yesterday morning and still.. perfect skin. I ranted and raved to my bf about this product and he said I already said that.. so I have to share with y'all! I also have $70 in my cart of Garnier skincare I am buying on payday. So happy 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful for dry skin.
reviews.reviewText: Have been using this cream for a few years and really love it. Sure helps anyone with dry skin. It’s smooth, soft and easy to use. Goes on moist and just makes your skin feel so much better as it takes care of the dryness of your skin. Wouldn’t be without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a fast absorbing moisturizer that seems to be a dupe of Clinique's moisture surge. It is less moisturizing than Clinique and it's not even close to beating CeraVe. It's very light and good for oily skin. There is a slight chemical fragrance. It is truly oil free and and won't aggravate seborrheic dermatitis.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best I've used yet!
reviews.reviewText: I've used a ton of moisturizers. I've used affordable store brands to brands that cost over $125 for a tiny tube or jar.Finding a good moisturizer is hard. This one is by far the best I've used and I hope will always be available for purchase. It's a winner!Gel is easily absorbed. No greasy feeling at all. Face is still soft the next day. It takes very little to do the job, so the product will last a long time. The smell is pleasant and not over powering. The jar is easy to open (important if you have arthritis, like I do even at 39).It's easy to use and so pleasant, while doing exactly what it says it does.I'd highly recommend this.For comparison, I have normal to dry skin. I can use it once a day or once every two days and have fantastic results. Someone with drier skin could easily obtain similar results by using the recommended twice a day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing gel cream
reviews.reviewText: Feels soothing, refreshing. There is no greasy feeling or residue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, cooling and scented
reviews.reviewText: I have been stuck in what seems like an endless cycle of rotating moisturizers in hopes of finding the one. I have very picky skin and tend to get breakouts from so many different ingredients. I also live in the Midwest with very cold dry winters. This one is definitely not the one, but it is nice for once in a while.The good- absorbs quickly and feels cooling on the skin. Offers moisture, but isn’t overwhelming. As long as I use sparingly, I don’t get breakouts. Wonderful for soothing after eyebrow plucking or exfoliating.The not so good- Not a heavy hitter for moisture. I find this nice in the summer/fall when it isn’t super dry outside. Doesn’t hold its own in winter time. My skin is left craving more moisture about two hours after application. This could be a great option for people who do not have dry skin and just need a little skin refresh. Also great for people who live in warmer climates.Tip- Keep chilled in fridge for an extra dose of calming for the skin. The gel base really helps to absorb the chill and it feels wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loyal user of this moisturizer for nearly a decade...
reviews.reviewText: I normally don't write reviews but I wanted to say, I've been using this moisturizer since I was an early teen (I'm 23 right now) and it has always been my go to. I've not used a different moisturizer in almost a decade and always come back to this one. If you haven't tried it, do yourself a favor and try it. Super lightweight thanks to it being a water creme, smells really pretty, and is nice and cooling on the skin when you use it. You won't regret giving it a shot! :)
A fabulous facial moisturizer which I have used for years. It has a light scent and absorbs quickly. Easy to apply and not sticky. Arrived on time with no issues. Very happy with purchase.
Es la segunda vez que las compro y me encantan. Tengo la piel seca/normal y no te dejan la cara grasosa. Mi piel lo absorbe rápidamente y se siente muy suave y fresca.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love this cream so gentle & soft on your skin non greasy my skin feels great.
Me encantó. Desde que probé este producto prefiero mil veces los hidratantes en gel que en crema. Se siente fresco en la piel y ayudó a mi piel seca a verse más hidratada sin dejarla grasa.
